LNPayDescriptionText1: To connect your LNPay wallet to Podverse, you will first need to login to your LNPay account at
LNPayDescriptionText2: After you are logged in, you will need to add your LNPay Public API Key below. You can find your API Key by visiting here:
LNPayDescriptionText3:
Once entered, we will use it to generate a Podverse specific wallet on your LNPay account, from which you will be able to send satoshis to podcasters.

When the wallet is created, please make sure you transfer some satoshis to it so you can boost your favorite podcasters!

You may also choose to enter a Wallet ID along with the Wallet Admin Key if you'd like to use an existing wallet.
Limit the number of downloaded episodes: Limit the number of downloaded episodes for each podcast by default
Once the download limit is exceeded, the oldest episode will be auto deleted.
Listen Tracking subtext: Enable listen tracking to have your listens counted in the popularity rankings.
Name: Name
Offline mode can save battery life and i: Offline mode can save battery life and improve performance in areas with poor connectivity.
Only allow downloading episodes when con: Only allow downloading episodes when connected to Wifi
Only with Link means only people who: Only with Link means only people who have your clip's link can play it. These clips will not show up automatically in the Public list on Podverse. A premium account is required to create Public clips.

Podcast supports value-for-value donatio: This podcast supports value-for-value donations. Setup your Bitcoin wallet to begin donating to podcasters from this app.

TermsOfServiceScreenMatomoTrackingText1: Podverse lets users optionally enable anonymized tracking within the app. We use this tracking information to help determine which content on the site (including podcasts, episodes, and clips) are most popular.
TermsOfServiceScreenMatomoTrackingText2: The tracking software we use is called Matomo, and it is a free and open source analytics platform. We host an instance of Matomo, so all tracking data is hosted on our servers, and individual user tracking data will never be sold to or shared with 3rd parties.
TermsOfServiceScreenMatomoTrackingText3: All of our tracking data is anonymized by obscuring the IP address by 2 bytes, which means IP addresses are obscured and then saved on our server with the format 192.168.xxx.xxx.
TermsOfServiceScreenMatomoTrackingText4: To further protect user anonymity, we do not use session IDs to track users across multiple visits. Likewise, to further protect anonymity, we do not use cookie-based tracking on our website.
TermsOfServiceScreenMatomoTrackingText5: While we use Matomo tracking data to help us determine what content is most popular on Podverse, users should keep in mind that these popularity metrics are easy to manipulate, and may not accurately reflect the popularity of content.
TermsOfServiceScreenMatomoTrackingTextFD: Podverse for F-Droid ***does not*** contain tracking software, but tracking software is present on the Podverse website and optionally in the iOS and Android versions.
TermsOfServiceScreenText1: Podverse will never sell or share private user data.
TermsOfServiceScreenText2: Podverse will never put advertisements next to or within a podcast's content without that podcast's permission.
TermsOfServiceScreenText3: All audio files found on podverse.fm load from the podcaster's own public server. We do not host podcast audio files ourselves.
TermsOfServiceScreenText4: All clips hosted on podverse.fm are crowd-sourced and unofficial, unless otherwise noted by the podcaster.
TermsOfServiceScreenText5: Clips load within the full episode's media file, so the user always has access to the full recording.
TermsOfServiceScreenText6: Podverse hosts Podcast Funding Links and content from third-party podcast feeds and sites. These have their own independent privacy policies, and we have no responsibility for their content or activities.
TermsOfServicesScreenText7: Podverse stores credentials for podcasts that require authentication on the device secure storage chip. Podverse does not use or store this data in any way other than to allow subscribing to podcast feeds that require authentication. This data does not get stored on any Podverse servers.

error_boundary_description: Pardon this interruption. Something went wrong but we've been notified and we're on it. In the meantime, feel free to get back to listening!

trackingTermsText1: Do you want to enable analytics tracking?
trackingTermsText2: Popularity rankings on Podverse are sorted by total unique listeners for that content.
trackingTermsText3: In order for your listens to count in these rankings, we need you to enable tracking.
trackingTermsText4: All the data we track is anonymized and hosted only on Podverse servers.
trackingTermsText5: We will never sell or share private tracking data.
value_tag_consent_checkbox_text: I have read and agreed to the Terms and Conditions
value_tag_consent_text_1: This is an experimental feature. To continue you must accept all the following terms:
value_tag_consent_text_2: - Podverse does not hold any responsibility for lost or corrupted funds and transactions.
value_tag_consent_text_3: - LNPay account and wallet access keys are stored on the device secure storage. Podverse only saves and uses these keys for LNPay transactions. If a device get compromised, lost or stolen, Podverse cannot prevent unauthorized use of your wallets.
value_tag_consent_text_4: - Lightning Network fees are automatically added to each transaction and are calculated by the Lightning Network. Podverse cannot predict transaction fees. The fees are charged separately and in addition to your donation.
value_tag_preview_boost: BOOST: Send a donation immediately to the podcaster
value_tag_preview_stream: STREAM: Send a donation per minute of listening time to a podcast
value_tag_preview_title: Send Bitcoin to your favorite podcasters
